characters: Multiple pedestrians and cyclists observed. A child in a blue jacket suddenly appears from the right side of the image, a woman with a child on her back suddenly appears from the left side of the image, a man in a yellow jacket suddenly appears from the left side of the image, and a cyclist suddenly appears from the right side of the image.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of 'ghost probing' behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly appears from the right side of the image, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a woman with a child on her back suddenly appears from the left side of the image, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a man in a yellow jacket suddenly appears from the left side of the image, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the fourth sequence, a cyclist suddenly appears from the right side of the image, emerging from behind a bus.
actions: The observer vehicle should immediately brake to avoid potential collisions with the suddenly appearing pedestrians and cyclist.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, a bus on the right side of the road, and multiple pedestrians and cyclists.
